akn:section.akn:heading: Printing and binding for the President

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1101. Printing and binding for the President The Director of the Government Publishing Office shall execute such printing and binding for the President as he may order and make requisition for. (Pub. L. 90–620, Oct. 22, 1968, 82 Stat. 1261; Pub. L. 113–235, div. H, title I, § 1301(c)(1), Dec. 16, 2014, 128 Stat. 2537.)
Historical and Revision NotesBased on 44 U.S. Code, 1964 ed., § 211 (Jan. 12, 1895, ch. 23, § 88, 28 Stat. 622).
Editorial Notes Codification Section constitutes part of section 88 of act Jan. 12, 1895. Remainder of section is classified to section 1713 of this title.
Amendments2014—Pub. L. 113–235 substituted “Director of the Government Publishing Office” for “Public Printer”.
